info.title: "Hello World" app API
info.description: API for "Hello World" app hosted at https://hello-world.vovk.dev/. Source code is available on Github https://github.com/finom/vovk-hello-world. For more information about this app, visit the documentation page https://vovk.dev/hello-world.

isError.description: Indicates that this object represents an error

get.description: Get the OpenAPI spec for the "Hello World" app API

x-codeSamples.label: TypeScript RPC
x-codeSamples.source:
import { OpenApiRPC } from 'vovk-hello-world';

const response = await OpenApiRPC.getSpec();

x-codeSamples.label: Python RPC
x-codeSamples.source:
from vovk_hello_world import OpenApiRPC

response = OpenApiRPC.get_spec()

x-codeSamples.label: Rust RPC
